Ark. (No need to write this.)"},{"lineNumber":250935,"originalJapaneseLine":"このブロックのランス達の冒険背景は　ゼス草原","translatedEnglishLine":"The adventure background for Rance and the others in this block is the Zeth Plains."},{"lineNumber":250936,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスのアサシンが現れ、魔法電話をランスに差し出す","translatedEnglishLine":"An assassin from Zeth appears, handing Rance a magic phone."},{"lineNumber":250937,"originalJapaneseLine":"アサシンは専用の絵は無いのでうまく表現して下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"There is no dedicated illustration for the assassin, so please depict them well."},{"lineNumber":250938,"originalJapaneseLine":"電話に出ると首都のマジックと通話","translatedEnglishLine":"When answering the phone, Rance converses with a magic user from the capital."},{"lineNumber":250939,"originalJapaneseLine":"待っていたわ、やっと来てくれたのね、早くきて","translatedEnglishLine":"I've been waiting; you finally came. Hurry and come."},{"lineNumber":250940,"originalJapaneseLine":"（　なんとなく焦りと怯え　）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Somewhat anxious and fearful)"},{"lineNumber":250941,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺が来るのはウルザから連絡がいっていたからだろうが","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm here because Urza sent word, right?"},{"lineNumber":250942,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくここにいるのが分かったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"How did you know I was here?"},{"lineNumber":250943,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス全土にはセンサー地蔵があって、大抵の動きはこちらで察知しているの","translatedEnglishLine":"Across all Zeth, there are sensor Jizo statues that detect most movements here."},{"lineNumber":250944,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵軍の動きも、ランス達の行動もね","translatedEnglishLine":"They monitor both enemy troop movements and the actions of Rance and his group."},{"lineNumber":250945,"originalJapaneseLine":"なに・・まさか、俺がセックスしている所も覗き見している","translatedEnglishLine":"What... you aren't spying on me having sex, are you?"},{"lineNumber":250946,"originalJapaneseLine":"わけないでしょ、そんな所までわかんないわよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course not; they wouldn't know that much."},{"lineNumber":250947,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジックをうまく見せて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Please depict the magic effectively."},{"lineNumber":250948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスが大変な様子、ランスが来るのを待っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth is in serious trouble; they're waiting for Rance to arrive."},{"lineNumber":250949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その付近も最近魔軍に占領されているので注意して進んでねとか","translatedEnglishLine":"They warn that the area nearby has recently been occupied by demon armies, so proceed with caution."},{"lineNumber":250950,"originalJapaneseLine":"資料．ワールド設定、魔法電話、情報魔法","translatedEnglishLine":"Reference: World settings, magic phone, information magic."},{"lineNumber":250951,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、ゼスのどこか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, somewhere in Zeth..."},{"lineNumber":250952,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジー、カオル、ウィチタ、後数名の精鋭魔法使い達。戦士達（元奴隷あがり）","translatedEnglishLine":"Gandhi, Kaoru, Wichita, and several other elite mages. Warriors (former slaves)."},{"lineNumber":250953,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス部隊と似たような感じで編成されている特殊攻撃部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"A special attack unit organized similarly to Rance's troops."},{"lineNumber":250954,"originalJapaneseLine":"各地の魔物将軍を襲って倒している。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are attacking and defeating monster generals across various locations."},{"lineNumber":250955,"originalJapaneseLine":"貴様、ゼスの国王か・・わざわざ殺されにきたのか、バカだな・・ぐはっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"You... the king of Zeth? Did you come here deliberately to be killed? Fool... Guh..."},{"lineNumber":250956,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪は倒す、よし、次の地域へ向かうぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We will defeat evil. Alright, let's move to the next area."},{"lineNumber":250957,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様がゼス国に入られたとの事です、そうかそれは頼もしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"I hear Lord Rance has entered Zeth country. That is reassuring."},{"lineNumber":250958,"originalJapaneseLine":"私では雑魚の魔物将軍は倒せても魔人には手が出ないからとか","translatedEnglishLine":"I can defeat minor monster generals, but I can't handle demon lords."},{"lineNumber":250959,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジー王無茶苦茶強いですという印象のシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"A scene giving the impression that King Gandhi is insanely strong."},{"lineNumber":250960,"originalJapaneseLine":"素敵です、ガンジー様とカオルうっとり","translatedEnglishLine":"Wonderful; Kaoru is enchanted by Lord Gandhi."},{"lineNumber":250961,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ガンジーは怒りを持って動いている表現で、何故怒っているかはここでは説明しない）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Gandhi is shown moving with anger, though the reason for his anger is not explained here.)"},{"lineNumber":250962,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は平原に多数転がる魔物兵の死体を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others discover many dead monster soldiers scattered across the plains."},{"lineNumber":250963,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵か・・みんな寝て居るぞ。よし奇襲して皆殺しに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster soldiers, huh... They're all sleeping. Alright, we'll attack by surprise and kill them all..."},{"lineNumber":250964,"originalJapaneseLine":"寝ていると思ったが、みんな死んでいた。毒殺されたようです","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought they were sleeping, but they were all dead. It seems they were poisoned."},{"lineNumber":250965,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰がしたんだろう・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder who did this..."},{"lineNumber":250966,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮから援軍として参加している毛利軍（３万）の陣地を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"They find the camp of the Mouri army (30,000 troops) participating as reinforcements from JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":250967,"originalJapaneseLine":"てるとちぬと再開、","translatedEnglishLine":"They reunite with Teru and Chinu."},{"lineNumber":250968,"originalJapaneseLine":"てる　妊娠中、ランスの子とここで知る、他に誰ともやってないからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Teru is pregnant; they learn here it's Rance's child, as she hasn't been with anyone else."},{"lineNumber":250969,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、もう産まれていないといけない時期なのだが、まだ出てこない。困った奴だ","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it's already time for the baby to be born, but it hasn't come out yet. What a troublesome one."},{"lineNumber":250970,"originalJapaneseLine":"心配は必要無い、注意しているといいつつ雑です。戦場を胎教とするとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to worry; though they say they're careful, it's sloppy. Using the battlefield as prenatal education, or something..."},{"lineNumber":250971,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちぬ、毒殺はちぬの仕業・・　始めて合う誰かがゾンビかと怖がるが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Chinu—was the poisoning her doing? Someone meeting her for the first time fears she might be a zombie..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに首都ラングバウに侵入し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally infiltrating the capital Langbau,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宿敵ミネバを倒しパットンが王に返り咲いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton defeated his archenemy Mineva and reclaimed the throne.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにわまとめ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniwa summary...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリス、スタッフコーナーです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alice, this is the staff corner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選んであげてね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please choose one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期なので出来れば多くの人にしてもらいたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's the last time, I'd like as many people as possible to participate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle status report

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス方面の戦況報告、ナレーション風
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle report from the Zeth area, narration style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の大軍により総崩れになりかけていたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forces were on the verge of total collapse due to the massive army of monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国連携の援軍、ＪＡＰＡＮから送られてきた毛利軍により体制を立て直していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the allied reinforcements from various countries, including the Mouri army sent from JAPAN, restored their formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵力３５万、すでに１０万ほど失っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have a strength of 350,000 troops, having already lost about 100,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利軍５万が援軍として参加している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Mouri army of 50,000 is participating as reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー王は魔人メディウサを倒すと決意して出かけて戻って来ていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King Gandhi set out determined to defeat the demon Medusa and has not returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （のちにメディウサにより石にされている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (He was later turned to stone by Medusa.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本土の半分が占領されている状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Half of the mainland is occupied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが首都に向けて出発します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance sets out toward the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちなみに首都の名前は国王名が付くのでラグナロックアークです。（書かなくても良い）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, the capital's name bears the king's name, so it is Ragnarok Ark. (No need to write this.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このブロックのランス達の冒険背景は　ゼス草原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure background for Rance and the others in this block is the Zeth Plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスのアサシンが現れ、魔法電話をランスに差し出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An assassin from Zeth appears, handing Rance a magic phone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アサシンは専用の絵は無いのでうまく表現して下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no dedicated illustration for the assassin, so please depict them well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 電話に出ると首都のマジックと通話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When answering the phone, Rance converses with a magic user from the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待っていたわ、やっと来てくれたのね、早くきて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been waiting; you finally came. Hurry and come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　なんとなく焦りと怯え　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Somewhat anxious and fearful)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が来るのはウルザから連絡がいっていたからだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm here because Urza sent word, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくここにいるのが分かったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How did you know I was here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス全土にはセンサー地蔵があって、大抵の動きはこちらで察知しているの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Across all Zeth, there are sensor Jizo statues that detect most movements here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵軍の動きも、ランス達の行動もね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They monitor both enemy troop movements and the actions of Rance and his group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに・・まさか、俺がセックスしている所も覗き見している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... you aren't spying on me having sex, are you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わけないでしょ、そんな所までわかんないわよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not; they wouldn't know that much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックをうまく見せて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please depict the magic effectively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスが大変な様子、ランスが来るのを待っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth is in serious trouble; they're waiting for Rance to arrive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その付近も最近魔軍に占領されているので注意して進んでねとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They warn that the area nearby has recently been occupied by demon armies, so proceed with caution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 資料．ワールド設定、魔法電話、情報魔法
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reference: World settings, magic phone, information magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ゼスのどこか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, somewhere in Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー、カオル、ウィチタ、後数名の精鋭魔法使い達。戦士達（元奴隷あがり）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi, Kaoru, Wichita, and several other elite mages. Warriors (former slaves).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス部隊と似たような感じで編成されている特殊攻撃部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A special attack unit organized similarly to Rance's troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の魔物将軍を襲って倒している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are attacking and defeating monster generals across various locations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様、ゼスの国王か・・わざわざ殺されにきたのか、バカだな・・ぐはっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You... the king of Zeth? Did you come here deliberately to be killed? Fool... Guh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪は倒す、よし、次の地域へ向かうぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will defeat evil. Alright, let's move to the next area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様がゼス国に入られたとの事です、そうかそれは頼もしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hear Lord Rance has entered Zeth country. That is reassuring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私では雑魚の魔物将軍は倒せても魔人には手が出ないからとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can defeat minor monster generals, but I can't handle demon lords.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー王無茶苦茶強いですという印象のシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene giving the impression that King Gandhi is insanely strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素敵です、ガンジー様とカオルうっとり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wonderful; Kaoru is enchanted by Lord Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ガンジーは怒りを持って動いている表現で、何故怒っているかはここでは説明しない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Gandhi is shown moving with anger, though the reason for his anger is not explained here.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は平原に多数転がる魔物兵の死体を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others discover many dead monster soldiers scattered across the plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵か・・みんな寝て居るぞ。よし奇襲して皆殺しに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldiers, huh... They're all sleeping. Alright, we'll attack by surprise and kill them all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ていると思ったが、みんな死んでいた。毒殺されたようです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought they were sleeping, but they were all dead. It seems they were poisoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰がしたんだろう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder who did this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから援軍として参加している毛利軍（３万）の陣地を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They find the camp of the Mouri army (30,000 troops) participating as reinforcements from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるとちぬと再開、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They reunite with Teru and Chinu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てる　妊娠中、ランスの子とここで知る、他に誰ともやってないからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru is pregnant; they learn here it's Rance's child, as she hasn't been with anyone else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、もう産まれていないといけない時期なのだが、まだ出てこない。困った奴だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it's already time for the baby to be born, but it hasn't come out yet. What a troublesome one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配は必要無い、注意しているといいつつ雑です。戦場を胎教とするとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to worry; though they say they're careful, it's sloppy. Using the battlefield as prenatal education, or something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぬ、毒殺はちぬの仕業・・　始めて合う誰かがゾンビかと怖がるが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chinu—was the poisoning her doing? Someone meeting her for the first time fears she might be a zombie...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Hurry and come."},{"lineNumber":250940,"originalJapaneseLine":"（　なんとなく焦りと怯え　）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Somewhat anxious and fearful)"},{"lineNumber":250941,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺が来るのはウルザから連絡がいっていたからだろうが","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm here because Urza sent word, right?"},{"lineNumber":250942,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくここにいるのが分かったな。","translatedEnglishLine":"How did you know I was here?"},{"lineNumber":250943,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス全土にはセンサー地蔵があって、大抵の動きはこちらで察知しているの","translatedEnglishLine":"Across all Zeth, there are sensor Jizo statues that detect most movements here."},{"lineNumber":250944,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵軍の動きも、ランス達の行動もね","translatedEnglishLine":"They monitor both enemy troop movements and the actions of Rance and his group."},{"lineNumber":250945,"originalJapaneseLine":"なに・・まさか、俺がセックスしている所も覗き見している","translatedEnglishLine":"What... you aren't spying on me having sex, are you?"},{"lineNumber":250946,"originalJapaneseLine":"わけないでしょ、そんな所までわかんないわよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Of course not; they wouldn't know that much."},{"lineNumber":250947,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジックをうまく見せて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Please depict the magic effectively."},{"lineNumber":250948,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゼスが大変な様子、ランスが来るのを待っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth is in serious trouble; they're waiting for Rance to arrive."},{"lineNumber":250949,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その付近も最近魔軍に占領されているので注意して進んでねとか","translatedEnglishLine":"They warn that the area nearby has recently been occupied by demon armies, so proceed with caution."},{"lineNumber":250950,"originalJapaneseLine":"資料．ワールド設定、魔法電話、情報魔法","translatedEnglishLine":"Reference: World settings, magic phone, information magic."},{"lineNumber":250951,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、ゼスのどこか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, somewhere in Zeth..."},{"lineNumber":250952,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジー、カオル、ウィチタ、後数名の精鋭魔法使い達。戦士達（元奴隷あがり）","translatedEnglishLine":"Gandhi, Kaoru, Wichita, and several other elite mages. Warriors (former slaves)."},{"lineNumber":250953,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス部隊と似たような感じで編成されている特殊攻撃部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"A special attack unit organized similarly to Rance's troops."},{"lineNumber":250954,"originalJapaneseLine":"各地の魔物将軍を襲って倒している。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are attacking and defeating monster generals across various locations."},{"lineNumber":250955,"originalJapaneseLine":"貴様、ゼスの国王か・・わざわざ殺されにきたのか、バカだな・・ぐはっ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"You... the king of Zeth? Did you come here deliberately to be killed? Fool... Guh..."},{"lineNumber":250956,"originalJapaneseLine":"悪は倒す、よし、次の地域へ向かうぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We will defeat evil. Alright, let's move to the next area."},{"lineNumber":250957,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様がゼス国に入られたとの事です、そうかそれは頼もしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"I hear Lord Rance has entered Zeth country. That is reassuring."},{"lineNumber":250958,"originalJapaneseLine":"私では雑魚の魔物将軍は倒せても魔人には手が出ないからとか","translatedEnglishLine":"I can defeat minor monster generals, but I can't handle demon lords."},{"lineNumber":250959,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガンジー王無茶苦茶強いですという印象のシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"A scene giving the impression that King Gandhi is insanely strong."},{"lineNumber":250960,"originalJapaneseLine":"素敵です、ガンジー様とカオルうっとり","translatedEnglishLine":"Wonderful; Kaoru is enchanted by Lord Gandhi."},{"lineNumber":250961,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ガンジーは怒りを持って動いている表現で、何故怒っているかはここでは説明しない）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Gandhi is shown moving with anger, though the reason for his anger is not explained here.)"},{"lineNumber":250962,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は平原に多数転がる魔物兵の死体を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others discover many dead monster soldiers scattered across the plains."},{"lineNumber":250963,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵か・・みんな寝て居るぞ。よし奇襲して皆殺しに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster soldiers, huh... They're all sleeping. Alright, we'll attack by surprise and kill them all..."},{"lineNumber":250964,"originalJapaneseLine":"寝ていると思ったが、みんな死んでいた。毒殺されたようです","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought they were sleeping, but they were all dead. It seems they were poisoned."},{"lineNumber":250965,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰がしたんだろう・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder who did this..."},{"lineNumber":250966,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮから援軍として参加している毛利軍（３万）の陣地を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"They find the camp of the Mouri army (30,000 troops) participating as reinforcements from JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":250967,"originalJapaneseLine":"てるとちぬと再開、","translatedEnglishLine":"They reunite with Teru and Chinu."},{"lineNumber":250968,"originalJapaneseLine":"てる　妊娠中、ランスの子とここで知る、他に誰ともやってないからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Teru is pregnant; they learn here it's Rance's child, as she hasn't been with anyone else."},{"lineNumber":250969,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただ、もう産まれていないといけない時期なのだが、まだ出てこない。困った奴だ","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it's already time for the baby to be born, but it hasn't come out yet. What a troublesome one."},{"lineNumber":250970,"originalJapaneseLine":"心配は必要無い、注意しているといいつつ雑です。戦場を胎教とするとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to worry; though they say they're careful, it's sloppy. Using the battlefield as prenatal education, or something..."},{"lineNumber":250971,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちぬ、毒殺はちぬの仕業・・　始めて合う誰かがゾンビかと怖がるが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Chinu—was the poisoning her doing? Someone meeting her for the first time fears she might be a zombie..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに首都ラングバウに侵入し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally infiltrating the capital Langbau,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宿敵ミネバを倒しパットンが王に返り咲いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Patton defeated his archenemy Mineva and reclaimed the throne.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はにわまとめ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Haniwa summary...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリス、スタッフコーナーです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alice, this is the staff corner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選んであげてね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please choose one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期なので出来れば多くの人にしてもらいたい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's the last time, I'd like as many people as possible to participate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle status report

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス方面の戦況報告、ナレーション風
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle report from the Zeth area, narration style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の大軍により総崩れになりかけていたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forces were on the verge of total collapse due to the massive army of monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国連携の援軍、ＪＡＰＡＮから送られてきた毛利軍により体制を立て直していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the allied reinforcements from various countries, including the Mouri army sent from JAPAN, restored their formation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵力３５万、すでに１０万ほど失っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have a strength of 350,000 troops, having already lost about 100,000.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利軍５万が援軍として参加している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Mouri army of 50,000 is participating as reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー王は魔人メディウサを倒すと決意して出かけて戻って来ていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: King Gandhi set out determined to defeat the demon Medusa and has not returned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （のちにメディウサにより石にされている）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (He was later turned to stone by Medusa.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本土の半分が占領されている状態。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Half of the mainland is occupied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが首都に向けて出発します
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance sets out toward the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちなみに首都の名前は国王名が付くのでラグナロックアークです。（書かなくても良い）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, the capital's name bears the king's name, so it is Ragnarok Ark. (No need to write this.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このブロックのランス達の冒険背景は　ゼス草原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure background for Rance and the others in this block is the Zeth Plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスのアサシンが現れ、魔法電話をランスに差し出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An assassin from Zeth appears, handing Rance a magic phone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アサシンは専用の絵は無いのでうまく表現して下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is no dedicated illustration for the assassin, so please depict them well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 電話に出ると首都のマジックと通話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When answering the phone, Rance converses with a magic user from the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待っていたわ、やっと来てくれたのね、早くきて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been waiting; you finally came. Hurry and come.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （　なんとなく焦りと怯え　）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Somewhat anxious and fearful)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が来るのはウルザから連絡がいっていたからだろうが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm here because Urza sent word, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくここにいるのが分かったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How did you know I was here?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス全土にはセンサー地蔵があって、大抵の動きはこちらで察知しているの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Across all Zeth, there are sensor Jizo statues that detect most movements here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵軍の動きも、ランス達の行動もね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They monitor both enemy troop movements and the actions of Rance and his group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに・・まさか、俺がセックスしている所も覗き見している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What... you aren't spying on me having sex, are you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わけないでしょ、そんな所までわかんないわよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course not; they wouldn't know that much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジックをうまく見せて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please depict the magic effectively.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスが大変な様子、ランスが来るのを待っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth is in serious trouble; they're waiting for Rance to arrive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その付近も最近魔軍に占領されているので注意して進んでねとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They warn that the area nearby has recently been occupied by demon armies, so proceed with caution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 資料．ワールド設定、魔法電話、情報魔法
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reference: World settings, magic phone, information magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ゼスのどこか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, somewhere in Zeth...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー、カオル、ウィチタ、後数名の精鋭魔法使い達。戦士達（元奴隷あがり）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gandhi, Kaoru, Wichita, and several other elite mages. Warriors (former slaves).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス部隊と似たような感じで編成されている特殊攻撃部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A special attack unit organized similarly to Rance's troops.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各地の魔物将軍を襲って倒している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are attacking and defeating monster generals across various locations.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様、ゼスの国王か・・わざわざ殺されにきたのか、バカだな・・ぐはっ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You... the king of Zeth? Did you come here deliberately to be killed? Fool... Guh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪は倒す、よし、次の地域へ向かうぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will defeat evil. Alright, let's move to the next area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様がゼス国に入られたとの事です、そうかそれは頼もしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I hear Lord Rance has entered Zeth country. That is reassuring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私では雑魚の魔物将軍は倒せても魔人には手が出ないからとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can defeat minor monster generals, but I can't handle demon lords.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガンジー王無茶苦茶強いですという印象のシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A scene giving the impression that King Gandhi is insanely strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 素敵です、ガンジー様とカオルうっとり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wonderful; Kaoru is enchanted by Lord Gandhi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ガンジーは怒りを持って動いている表現で、何故怒っているかはここでは説明しない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Gandhi is shown moving with anger, though the reason for his anger is not explained here.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は平原に多数転がる魔物兵の死体を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others discover many dead monster soldiers scattered across the plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵か・・みんな寝て居るぞ。よし奇襲して皆殺しに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster soldiers, huh... They're all sleeping. Alright, we'll attack by surprise and kill them all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ていると思ったが、みんな死んでいた。毒殺されたようです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought they were sleeping, but they were all dead. It seems they were poisoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰がしたんだろう・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder who did this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから援軍として参加している毛利軍（３万）の陣地を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They find the camp of the Mouri army (30,000 troops) participating as reinforcements from JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるとちぬと再開、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They reunite with Teru and Chinu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てる　妊娠中、ランスの子とここで知る、他に誰ともやってないからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru is pregnant; they learn here it's Rance's child, as she hasn't been with anyone else.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、もう産まれていないといけない時期なのだが、まだ出てこない。困った奴だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it's already time for the baby to be born, but it hasn't come out yet. What a troublesome one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 心配は必要無い、注意しているといいつつ雑です。戦場を胎教とするとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to worry; though they say they're careful, it's sloppy. Using the battlefield as prenatal education, or something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちぬ、毒殺はちぬの仕業・・　始めて合う誰かがゾンビかと怖がるが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chinu—was the poisoning her doing? Someone meeting her for the first time fears she might be a zombie...
